attributes.action: Keep Internet the way it is
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I move that the request that child pornography on the internet is an issue should be publically dismissed. I am online 24-7 since the internet has been available. I think that this is some sort of governemenr scandal to get the public to vote against internet privacy laws. I can t get free porn let alone have I ever even seen such a thing so easily accessible.
Why do you guys continue to twist the truth in order to get what you really want.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
